attributes.action: find a special way to recognise the great contribution to Britain of our surviving First World War Veterans.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: France awarded Henry Allingham and Harry Patch their Legion Of Honour several years ago and recently made them Officers of the Legion Of Honour.Well done France. We ask that they are also recognised by their own country in a special way in the gift of the PM.
